text: Time is a waste of money
author: Oscar Wilde

text: To be natural is such a very difficult pose to keep up
author: Oscar Wilde

text: Always forgive your enemies; nothing annoys them so much
author: Oscar Wilde

text: The books that the world calls immoral are books that show the world its own shame.
author: Oscar Wilde

text: Life is much too important a thing ever to talk seriously about it.
author: Oscar Wilde

text: The people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world are the ones who do.
author: Steven Paul Jobs

text: I’m convinced that about half of what separates successful entrepreneurs from the non-successful ones is pure perseverance
author: Steven Paul Jobs

text: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower
author: Steven Paul Jobs

text: Have the courage to follow your heart and intuition. They somehow know what you truly want to become
author: Steven Paul Jobs

text: Sometimes life is going to hit you in the head with a brick. Don’t lose faith.
author: Steven Paul Jobs
